Html:
I'm sorry, but I can't figure this one out.  I've looked online and searched the posts but can't find an answer. 

Rawr is putting gem slots in waist items that don't actually have slots and putting one extra slot in items that do have slots.  For instance, my Relentless Gladiators Cord of Alacrity actually only has one slot.  It shows this item like that in the comparisons list.  However, it also shows the item three more times with two gems inserted, even though the item actually only has one slot.  If I right click the item and go to Edit, it shows only one slot under Sockets.  Every item in the waist comparison list is like this. 

How did I mess this up?

wow.  that was it.  sorry.  I had never noticed that check box before and somehow I managed to click on it.

 

Thanks
Err..  that's a good thing, since the slot is BoE.  BS only slots are wrist & hands.
